document_data.name: Lion Tribe
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Lion Tribe''' were one of the major roaming tribes of the [[Shaar]]. Their territory consisted of the plains ranging from [[Lake Lhespen]] to the [[Landrise]], south of the [[River Shaar]].

Raiders of the Lion Tribe were known for charging their foes and making a frenzy of slashing attacks, similar to the [[lion|animal]] from which they took their name.
